item.description: SINGLES HAPPY HOUR. Come join us after work and relax with old and new friends. Weâ€™ll enjoy appetizers, fantastic company, and mix and mingle with other singles. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 32 Cooke Street: I-84 Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), then Exit 2 (Rt. 372), end of ramp turn left onto New Britain Avenue, at next light turn right onto Cooke Street, facility on right.
